topic.title: 세탁소에 얼룩진 셔츠 맡기기
topic.description: 세탁소에 얼룩진 셔츠를 맡기고 언제 찾을 수 있는지 묻는 상황입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 이 셔츠 세탁 좀 맡기려고요.
네, 그런데 여기 커피 얼룩이 있네요.
네, 맞아요. 이 얼룩을 뺄 수 있을까요?
최선을 다해보겠지만, 완전히 빠질 거라고 장담은 못 드려요.
알겠습니다. 그럼 언제쯤 찾으러 오면 될까요?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hi, I'd like to drop this shirt off for cleaning.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hi, | I'd like to drop this shirt off | for cleaning.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay, but there's a coffee stain here.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay, | but there's a coffee stain | here.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, that's right. Can you get this stain out?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | that's right. || Can you get this stain out?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: We'll do our best, but I can't guarantee it will come out completely.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: We'll do our best, || but I can't guarantee | it will come out completely.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I understand. Then when can I come pick it up?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I understand. || Then when | can I come pick it up?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: It will be ready from Friday afternoon.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: It will be ready | from Friday afternoon.
